titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on dimethylbenzylidene sorbitol and 4,4'-isopropylidenedicyclohexanol.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/30/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the duty on dimethylbenzylidene sorbitol and 4,4'-isopropylidenedicyclohexanol through December 31, 1990.
